title: Team Motivation Levels, #FootClanTitles (+ Week 18 Waivers) - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/4
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, it’s time to celebrate those #FootClan Titles! Plus, a recap of the Monday Night game between the Browns and Steelers, NFL Playoff scenarios, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 4th, 2022.
  
 (05:35) - Monday Night Recap
 (12:40) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (20:30) - NFL News
 (34:05) - Week 18 Waivers
 (34:15) - WR Waivers
 (42:25) - RB Waivers
 (48:00) - TE Waivers
 (50:10) - DST Streamers
 (54:20) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
